pages.text: Via devilish courier, this $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() summons $(l:bewitchment:creatures/baphomet)Baphomet$(); you'll want to keep them away from other beings.$(br2)Prepare $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Grotesque Stew$(), should you want to $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledge$() to them.$(br2)The $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() is started by sacrificing a Sheep with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)Athame$().
